title: Divide & Conquer
description: An underground current is violently ripping through many houses of worship today. This current is killing the Children of God by robbig them their dreams, their joy, their peace their very sanity and most of all, their relationship and connection with God. What is the name of this perpatrator? It's name is Spiritual Abuse. Inside, we will discuss the brutal effects of Spiritual Abuse. This book is a must read to all leaders who take serious their call and duty to the Ministry.
author: Shamielle Alston
